input.context_nl:

rules: (r0, 0.87): If the parent of the third person is the second person, and the child of the first person is the third person, then the spouse of the first person is the second person (r1, 0.49): If the child of the third person is the second person, and the spouse of the third person is the first person, then the child of the first person is the second person (r2, 0.9): If the parent of the third person is the second person, and the child of the second person is the third person, and the child of the second person is the first person, then the parent of the first person is the second person (r3, 0.5): If the predecessor of the first person is the third person, and the parent of the first person is the third person, and the parent of the second person is the first person, then the successor of the first person is the second person (r4, 0.99): If the successor of the second person is the first person, then the predecessor of the first person is the second person.

input.question_nl: Is the hypothesis true given the facts and rules?
